remarks: Version of ~ equsal with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-equsalv.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-equsalv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-equsalv $p |- ( A. x ( x = y -> ph ) <-> ps ) $.
$d x y $.
